feed.title: Blinko Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Blinko: Blinko 1.0.7
entry.content:
‚ú® New Features

  • add AI configuration import feature with multilingual support in translation files https://github.com/blinkospace/blinko/commit/552e8812296a48c7dd601d16695e904f19b12605

‚ú® New Features

  • add Tauri process and updater plugins to enhance application functionality https://github.com/blinkospace/blinko/commit/8c7ff53b112ebaabcb16c83cc114aee9a1c2ea45
  • add showOverlay prop to UserAvatarDropdown for hover effect in Sidebar https://github.com/blinkospace/blinko/commit/5e385d88a13f4c2e39315b24c5b4f8e3db587355
  • enhance settings page layout with responsive design for mobile and desktop views https://github.com/blinkospace/blinko/commit/6173bb9c7ea673450353e7bfa225b849f3cdb031
  • conditionally add Tauri updater plugin for non-mobile platforms https://github.com/blinkospace/blinko/commit/ad8a67ad67b8969d3807b145df5a32ee18844bec
  • Update changelog configuration to improve commit type handling and rendering https://github.com/blinkospace/blinko/commit/6ebc5b7887339c40458b5d5225129a5336af7891

üêõ Bugfixes

  • correct syntax for server start callback in index.ts https://github.com/blinkospace/blinko/commit/4a1dc748e52286f8dd9d14982849f90697648c2a
  • update sign-in redirect to use dynamic Blinko endpoint https://github.com/blinkospace/blinko/commit/3371829ae47bdbdf2318a18669e59a6832499af6

üîß Chores

  • Update version to 1.0.5 https://github.com/blinkospace/blinko/commit/2e4fed56779e9a3ec4ea7c1770f4039f4e7c8542
  • Update version to 1.0.7 https://github.com/blinkospace/blinko/commit/2374b6eae9487e70319aee2b2d36aebe950e8bb1
  • Fix changelog configuration format https://github.com/blinkospace/blinko/commit/5715d8299023ad95d99dc969cc54c021b2cc744f

üîç Other Changes

  • [ci skip] Update version to 1.0.6 https://github.com/blinkospace/blinko/commit/7f66e71cf91a595ab461f3cdca019cf377e4e6e8
  • [ci skip] Update version to 1.0.5 https://github.com/blinkospace/blinko/commit/8be01a601481d5189f975ae1e6b84f67f52f635a
  • [ci skip] Update version to 1.0.6 https://github.com/blinkospace/blinko/commit/a21b5b63f22e75a473e8c93d9b59542ee36d61ef
  • Merge branch 'main' of https://github.com/blinkospace/blinko https://github.com/blinkospace/blinko/commit/f13ce87306d131122080539747137b918598de8a
  • Merge pull request #712 by blinko-space from blinkospace/bug-fix https://github.com/blinkospace/blinko/commit/4e5e31c830ba3e50f8f07f33c221ad6244ce8f81
  • [ci skip] Update version to 1.0.7 https://github.com/blinkospace/blinko/commit/84540970e8d3dfade90997ee3fa18eebc8a1687d
  • Merge branch 'main' of https://github.com/blinkospace/blinko https://github.com/blinkospace/blinko/commit/a3dd691ed82298c59511ae4192fb5f693ebc0bf7

‚ú®chore

  • update changelog generation process to use new action and fetch all tags https://github.com/blinkospace/blinko/commit/f45e8329a65346d385972c334c69cfa38e2d8670
  • install global prisma packae to enhance dependency management https://github.com/blinkospace/blinko/commit/684af739b14fd30fe94e3c9b84d6b819d5dd798f

entry.title: New release for Blinko: Blinko 1.1.0
entry.content:
‚ú® New Features

  • Refactor note management in BlinkoStore to support multiple views and improve data fetching https://github.com/blinkospace/blinko/commit/a0349d0bc6c243cb96de1dadb7582902a290314b
  • Add initial Helm chart for Blinko application with PostgreSQL dependency and configuration https://github.com/blinkospace/blinko/commit/711202f902d80018a1086f6e0d58b8e323e0f7b1
  • Reintroduce OpenAPI integration in API routes for improved documentation handling https://github.com/blinkospace/blinko/commit/c3f76bd870f1c5a05826bce2940bc83f70bdbee7
  • Update vditor to version 3.11.1 and enhance CSS styles for list padding https://github.com/blinkospace/blinko/commit/b8fad75e97727dc86b436ce0bf615d7c047076b6
  • Emplement gzip compression for lute.min.js in API routes https://github.com/blinkospace/blinko/commit/e9bed6a50b1f9dd3c298aa46613adda659bc45a7
  • Add cache clearing functionality and new translations for multiple languages https://github.com/blinkospace/blinko/commit/78fe7656c8d47a0c40e0c6f34b379db036c17adc
  • Enhance ScrollableTabs component to support avatar display and update Hub page to use ResponsiveTabs https://github.com/blinkospace/blinko/commit/6baaa6271cdfae45ea3171357827ee80ebf6fc40

üîß Chores

  • Add .gitignore file to exclude Helm chart package files https://github.com/blinkospace/blinko/commit/54617f5d85e645559cffa64de70ec721fa617f04
  • Clean up Helm chart values.yaml by removing unused ingress host configuration https://github.com/blinkospace/blinko/commit/f2094a484adacde7b5a2c504ff72a6e88cf4bfd6
  • Update version to 1.1.0 https://github.com/blinkospace/blinko/commit/21cc39c47d170bab10b3c1c2f99edeab57d7fb94

üîç Other Changes

  • Merge pull request #719 by the-ebdm from the-ebdm/infra/create-helm-chart https://github.com/blinkospace/blinko/commit/28d72ffb2087a51ed13094388f2dfb9da8299866
  • Merge branch 'main' of https://github.com/blinkospace/blinko https://github.com/blinkospace/blinko/commit/d84c4e6c8d2107d403539b8c28525867e19d32de

entry.title: New release for Blinko: Blinko 1.1.1
entry.content:
üêõ Bugfixes

  • Chinese interface translation error, "Agent" should be "to-do" related issue: #715 https://github.com/blinkospace/blinko/commit/a63a3a514319236be829e6f9c12b996adf28f148
  • The state of oauth is too weak. https://github.com/blinkospace/blinko/commit/c01503936c8d77ef07e0620c34d836664d83817d
  • service worker interferes with oauth callback https://github.com/blinkospace/blinko/commit/0bac5d5ab448e3a8be880d05c0e431c8a31141cb

üîç Other Changes

  • [ci skip] Update version to 1.1.0 https://github.com/blinkospace/blinko/commit/ff752bc3225f04d3672973501f664714db228299
  • fix translation Dutch/NL: Todo https://github.com/blinkospace/blinko/commit/6168fa8359f9814c5e2d0ea9b8a36578b71da765
  • Merge pull request #728 by IvanLi-CN from IvanLi-CN/fix-the-state-of-oauth-is-too-weak https://github.com/blinkospace/blinko/commit/76b7703a46f736ba330cf886dd5ca5840d2fdbb6
  • Merge pull request #727 by bjornclauw from bjornclauw/main https://github.com/blinkospace/blinko/commit/7aac90bfacb075c01b3fa6156f07a60d38f9b6b2
  • Merge pull request #725 by jhao0413 from jhao0413/main https://github.com/blinkospace/blinko/commit/3eee3f7951c7d3d28f7afeec8af531f73ce01963

entry.title: New release for Blinko: Blinko 1.1.2
entry.content:
‚ú® New Features

  • Add deployment selection and API key validation for Azure OpenAI integration https://github.com/blinkospace/blinko/commit/150c14646121a265c794cfbfe560da0b35084644
  • Add deployment selection and API key configuration prompts in multiple languages https://github.com/blinkospace/blinko/commit/f526a82aafba601e38a3ebc326786fc9b5b726f2

entry.title: New release for Blinko: Blinko 1.2.0
entry.content:
‚ú® New Features

  • support weekly display #758 https://github.com/blinkospace/blinko/commit/cff983f386c489aecd5e4bd48b014c3af37ae803
  • More Flexible AI Feature Selection, add custom ai process #743 https://github.com/blinkospace/blinko/commit/bb66ab40fb552478bbbc122afc868422c4ab31b1

üêõ Bugfixes

  • default theme color does not appear correctly https://github.com/blinkospace/blinko/commit/5ad8f926cc0c162a1e3ff87905d9cec8d0a16556
  • Can't find variable: Katex #753 https://github.com/blinkospace/blinko/commit/d66f5063b05fa1a617b67f0622c5dc4ea2a158c4
  • file token issues #722 https://github.com/blinkospace/blinko/commit/9b22496f687c5ddbabc0756fa03b109efdb1c72a

üêõ Bugfixes

  • update image source to include token for user avatar https://github.com/blinkospace/blinko/commit/94c1e1adc66c4d8707923919d9ad5b793eca4796

üíÑ Code Style Changes

  • Adjust spacing in TagListPanel and Sidebar components for improved layout https://github.com/blinkospace/blinko/commit/82da9302749afbbc5cd69cd89faf5d6c7b37a213

üîß Chores

  • Update version to 1.2.0 https://github.com/blinkospace/blinko/commit/56876a5042688b39da3e7e6e5acdb897873d9962

üîç Other Changes
